name: Droppin' My Ballz
description:
Thanks for checking out my first ever game.

Is everything OK? Seriously, are you feeling alright?
There are like a billion games on this site and you chose this one?
Meh, it's your boring funeral.

How To Play:

  • While the ball is falling, click and hold the mouse to make it fall faster.
  • Bounce the ball off the moving platform.
  • Each bounce will increase the score, as well as make the platform move faster.
  • Bouncing also makes the timer re-fill. Don't let it run out!
  • Fully customizable player/platform colours can be found in the settings.

If you have any suggestions for features to add/improvements to gameplay, please leave a comment and I'll be happy to update the game in the future.

Thanks again, and GL,HV
